code_value: Questions 1-2: In your school calendar, there is a one-week labor course this term. Ask your head teacher two questions about it.</br> Questions 3-4: Your school is going to select ten students for an exchange program in the U.S., ask your head teacher two questions about it.
Questions 1-2: In your school calendar, there is a one-week labor course this term. Ask your head teacher two questions about it.
Questions 3-4: Your school is going to select ten students for an exchange program in the U.S., ask your head teacher two questions about it.
